channel.title: What changes is each revision?
channel.description: So I think it's time I listened to my players and moved onto a new cache. But I don't want to download a new source and start from scratch again. I was just wondering if there is anything I would need to change server-sided besides uKeys and (possibly) the login protocol to allow a newer client to connect properly and work. Can someone with experience in this area help me? If all I need to do is change the uKeys, then examine the login protocol and see if I need to change anything, I could probably just do it tonight.

item.title: What changes is each revision?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

So I think it’s time I listened to my players and moved onto a new cache. But I don’t want to download a new source and start from scratch again. I was just wondering if there is anything I would need to change server-sided besides uKeys and (possibly) the login protocol to allow a newer client to connect properly and work. Can someone with experience in this area help me? If all I need to do is change the uKeys, then examine the login protocol and see if I need to change anything, I could probably just do it tonight.

Read full topic
